name: Sports for Everyone Quiz | The Sports Challenge | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who won the FIFA World Cup in 1994?
Who won the FIFA World Cup in 1990?
What is Mark Calloway known as?
How many teams did Wayne Gretzky play for during his hockey career in the NHL?
questions.explanation:
4.

	4, the Edmonton Oilers, Los Angeles Kings, St. Louis Blues, and New York Rangers.

questions.text: James Naismith invented basketball; what country was he from?
Who beat the Netherlands in the 2000 Euro Cup semi-finals?
What country won the 2000 Gold Cup in soccer?
What team did Wayne Gretzky play his final game against?
questions.explanation:
Pittsburgh Penguins.

	Fittingly, Wayne recorded an assist in his final game as his final point.

questions.text: What team did Shannon Sharpe play NFL football for?
questions.explanation:
Baltimore Ravens.

	He played for the Broncos in the 1990s, then with Baltimore.

questions.text: Who won the Super Bowl in 1997-1998 season?
